So, what if the financial strength of the Muslim world was used to win over downtrodden Americans, was used to win over movie stars and music stars leading thousands of fans to Islam. 
 
 There's a new novel coming out based on this premise. I found a link to a sign up form for a free copy of the book. The name of the book is Prayers for the Assassin.
 
 I signed up for it, haven't gotten it yet...but it sounds interesting.
 
 Here's the link
 
 http://www.prayersfortheassassin.com/outreach.php

Is it gonna Sunni Islam or Shi'ite Islam?
 
 I reckon the Shi'ite Muslims of Iran oughta be real happy with us because we handed Iraq over to the Shi-ite Muslims.

Is it gonna Sunni Islam or Shi'ite Islam?
 
 I reckon the Shi'ite Muslims of Iran oughta be real happy with us because we handed Iraq over to the Shi-ite Muslims.
It's grossly unrealistic either way, but I think the Sunnis have much more clout than the Shi'ites, if only in terms of numbers.
